One of my absolute favorite games of all time, a perfect game in my books. I'd rather not spoil too much of it, even if it's been like 10 years, but just let it be known. This is a perfect game, with extremely good gameplay, good puzzles, amazing story and good replay value. On sale, this game can be less than a DOLLAR, I paid full price for it when I played on Xbox 360, but when I switched I got it for a single dollar. Might've been the greatest dollar I've ever spent in my life.

10/10
(p.s. go check out portal stories: mel, and portal: reloaded)
nice story, mind bending puzzles and some great action
